title: CHAOSTOO
author: CHAOSTOO
content: I need artists or just crypto-enthusiasts for my project in Metaverse. If you are a responsible and creative person, I will be waiting for you in my team.From you will be required, not much information about yourself.Projects (if any).Payment will be negotiated during the interview.

comments.author: rahulzx
comments.body: Quote from: CHAOSTOO on April 06, 2023, 09:49:14 AMI need artists or just crypto-enthusiasts for my project in Metaverse. If you are a responsible and creative person, I will be waiting for you in my team.From you will be required, not much information about yourself.Projects (if any).Payment will be negotiated during the interview.you can reach many artists on platform like fiverr ,there are lot of professionals to fulfill your desire for a reasonable price.
